messages.content: Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Letter from the Chief Executive Officer"
German human reference: "Brief des Vorstandsvorsitzenden"
German translation: "Brief des Vorstandsvorsitzenden"
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Dear Shareholders,"
German human reference: "Liebe Aktionärinnen und Aktionäre,"
German translation: "Sehr geehrte Aktionäre,"
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "
2022 will be remembered as a sad year by many of us, the year that brought great suffering to many people, in particular in Ukraine, and in which the illusion of a European peace order shattered."
German human reference: "das Jahr 2022 wird vielen von uns in trauriger Erinnerung bleiben, weil es großes Leid über viele Menschen, insbesondere in der Ukraine gebracht hat und die Illusion einer europäischen Friedensordnung zerplatzen ließ."
German translation: "2022 wird von vielen von uns als ein trauriges Jahr in Erinnerung bleiben, ein Jahr, das vielen Menschen großes Leid brachte, insbesondere in der Ukraine, und in dem die Illusion einer europäischen Friedensordnung zerbrach."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "It was also a year in which challenges accumulated in a way that we have not seen for decades. Prices for gas and other energy sources surged considerably, the capital markets were, at times, wildly volatile, and inflation escalated in many parts of the world."
German human reference: "Und als ein Jahr, in dem sich die Herausforderungen in einer Weise geballt haben, wie wir es seit Jahrzehnten nicht erlebt hatten: die erheblichen Preissteigerungen bei Gas und anderen Energieträgern, die teils wilden Schwankungen an den Kapitalmärkten und die ausufernde Inflation in vielen Teilen der Welt sind hier zuvorderst zu nennen."
German translation: "Es war auch ein Jahr, in dem sich die Herausforderungen in einer Weise häuften, die wir seit Jahrzehnten nicht gesehen haben. Die Preise für Gas und andere Energiequellen stiegen erheblich, die Kapitalmärkte waren zeitweise extrem volatil, und die Inflation eskalierte in vielen Teilen der Welt."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "These are just a few of the main challenges; the list goes on."
German human reference: "Aber die Liste der Risikofaktoren ließe sich leicht fortführen."
German translation: "Das sind nur einige der Hauptherausforderungen; die Liste geht weiter."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "In this kind of environment, our clients look to us as a bank to help them hedge their risks, maintain their liquidity and preserve their assets."
German human reference: "In einem derartigen Umfeld sind wir als Bank besonders gefragt, unsere Kunden dabei zu unterstützen, sich gegen Risiken abzusichern, Liquidität zu erhalten und Vermögen zu bewahren."
German translation: "In einer solchen Umgebung wenden sich unsere Kunden als Bank an uns, um ihnen zu helfen, ihre Risiken abzusichern, ihre Liquidität zu erhalten und ihr Vermögen zu bewahren."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "At the same time, our clients seek our partnership and our advice to be able to continue investing in strategic projects for the future, despite the uncertainty."
German human reference: "Gleichzeitig sind wir als Partner und Berater gefordert, um trotz der Unsicherheit weiter in strategische Zukunftsprojekte zu investieren."
German translation: "Gleichzeitig suchen unsere Kunden unsere Partnerschaft und unseren Rat, um trotz der Unsicherheit weiterhin in strategische Projekte für die Zukunft investieren zu können."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our results for the past year prove that we succeeded at this task."
German human reference: "Unsere Ergebnisse für das vergangene Jahr belegen, dass wir dieser Aufgabe erfolgreich nachgekommen sind."
German translation: "Unsere Ergebnisse für das vergangene Jahr beweisen, dass wir diese Aufgabe erfolgreich gemeistert haben."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our clients sought our expertise and did significantly more business with us."
German human reference: "Unsere Kunden haben unsere Expertise gesucht und deutlich mehr Geschäft mit uns gemacht."
German translation: "Unsere Kunden haben unsere Expertise gesucht und deutlich mehr Geschäfte mit uns gemacht."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our bank's full-year revenues rose by 7% to € 27.2 billion, a level we have not reached since 2016."
German human reference: "Die Erträge unserer Bank stiegen 2022 um 7% auf 27,2 Mrd. € und damit auf ein Niveau, wie wir es seit 2016 nicht mehr erreicht hatten."
German translation: "Die Gesamteinnahmen unserer Bank stiegen um 7% auf 27,2 Milliarden Euro, ein Niveau, das wir seit 2016 nicht erreicht haben."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our non-interest expenses once again decreased by 5% to € 20.4 billion, despite inflation-related cost pressure in many areas."
German human reference: "Gleichzeitig haben wir unsere zinsunabhängigen Aufwendungen trotz des inflationsbedingten Kostendrucks in vielen Bereichen erneut um 5% auf 20,4 Mrd. € gesenkt."
German translation: "Unsere Nichtzinsausgaben sanken trotz inflationsbedingten Kostendrucks in vielen Bereichen erneut um 5% auf 20,4 Milliarden Euro."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "As a result, we increased our pre-tax profit by 65% year on year to € 5.6 billion."
German human reference: "Als Konsequenz steigerten wir den Vorsteuergewinn gegenüber dem Vorjahr um 65% auf 5,6 Mrd. €."
German translation: "Als Ergebnis haben wir unseren Vorsteuergewinn im Jahresvergleich um 65% auf 5,6 Milliarden Euro gesteigert."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "This is Deutsche Bank's best result in 15 years and is testament to our resilience in difficult times."
German human reference: "Dies ist das beste Ergebnis der Deutschen Bank seit 15 Jahren und ein Beleg für unsere Widerstandskraft in schwierigen Zeiten."
German translation: "Dies ist das beste Ergebnis der Deutschen Bank seit 15 Jahren und bezeugt unsere Widerstandsfähigkeit in schwierigen Zeiten."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Other financial indicators equally underscore this resilience; for example, we succeeded at limiting loan loss provisions to € 1.2 billion, equivalent to 25 basis points of the average loan volume and exactly in the range we had predicted immediately after Russia's invasion of Ukraine."
German human reference: "Diese lässt sich an weiteren Indikatoren ablesen: So konnten wir die Risikovorsorge im Kreditgeschäft auf 1,2 Mrd. € beschränken – das entsprach 25 Basispunkten des durchschnittlichen Kreditvolumens und lag genau in dem Bereich, den wir direkt nach Russlands Invasion in der Ukraine vorhergesagt hatten."
German translation: "Andere Finanzindikatoren unterstreichen ebenfalls diese Widerstandsfähigkeit; zum Beispiel gelang es uns, die Rückstellungen für Kreditverluste auf 1,2 Milliarden Euro zu begrenzen, was 25 Basispunkten des durchschnittlichen Kreditvolumens entspricht und genau im Bereich liegt, den wir unmittelbar nach Russlands Invasion in der Ukraine vorhergesagt hatten."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "In a volatile year like 2022 especially, this first-class risk management was crucial."
German human reference: "Gerade in einem volatilen Jahr wie 2022 war dieses erstklassige Risikomanagement von größter Bedeutung."
German translation: "In einem so volatilen Jahr wie 2022 war dieses erstklassige Risikomanagement entscheidend."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "In addition, we kept our Common Equity Tier 1 ratio almost consistently above 13%."
German human reference: "Zudem haben wir unsere harte Kernkapitalquote fast durchgängig über 13% gehalten."
German translation: "Darüber hinaus haben wir unser Verhältnis des Common Equity Tier 1 fast durchgehend über 13% gehalten."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "This gives us the leeway this year to propose a dividend of 30 cents per share to the Annual General Meeting."
German human reference: "Das gibt uns den Spielraum, der Hauptversammlung eine Dividende von 30 Cent je Aktie vorzuschlagen."
German translation: "Dies gibt uns den Spielraum, in diesem Jahr eine Dividende von 30 Cent pro Aktie für die Jahreshauptversammlung vorzuschlagen."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "That would be an increase of 50% over 2021."
German human reference: "Das wäre ein Anstieg um 50% gegenüber dem Vorjahr."
German translation: "Das wäre eine Steigerung von 50% gegenüber 2021."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Transformation goals achieved by the end of 2022"
German human reference: "Transformationsziele Ende 2022 erreicht"
German translation: "Transformationziele bis Ende 2022 erreicht"
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "With the results for 2022, we have demonstrated that our bank is robust and sustainably profitable."
German human reference: "Mit den Ergebnissen für 2022 haben wir untermauert, dass unsere Bank robust und nachhaltig profitabel ist."
German translation: "Mit den Ergebnissen für 2022 haben wir gezeigt, dass unsere Bank robust und nachhaltig profitabel ist."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "This was precisely what we aimed to do when we announced our transformation back in July 2019."
German human reference: "Genau das war das Ziel der Transformation, die wir im Juli 2019 auf den Weg brachten."
German translation: "Genau das war unser Ziel, als wir unsere Transformation im Juli 2019 ankündigten."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "We can only focus fully on our clients if our bank is strong and successful."
German human reference: "Denn nur, wenn wir als Bank stabil und geschäftlich erfolgreich sind, können wir unseren vollen Fokus darauf richten, für unsere Kunden da zu sein."
German translation: "Wir können uns nur voll und ganz auf unsere Kunden konzentrieren, wenn unsere Bank stark und erfolgreich ist."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "To get there, we have completed an ambitious programme over the past three and a half years."
German human reference: "Um dahin zu kommen, haben wir in den vergangenen dreieinhalb Jahren ein ehrgeiziges Programm absolviert."
German translation: "Um dort hinzukommen, haben wir ein ehrgeiziges Programm in den letzten dreieinhalb Jahren abgeschlossen."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "We have aligned our four business divisions according to their strengths and consistently exited non-strategic business areas."
German human reference: "Wir haben unsere vier Geschäftsbereiche auf ihre Stärken ausgerichtet und uns konsequent aus nicht-strategischen Geschäftsfeldern zurückgezogen."
German translation: "Wir haben unsere vier Geschäftsbereiche nach ihren Stärken ausgerichtet und konsequent nicht-strategische Geschäftsbereiche verlassen."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "At the same time, we have become much more efficient; we have reduced running costs by more than € 3 billion since 2018."
German human reference: "Gleichzeitig sind wir deutlich effizienter geworden; die laufenden Kosten haben wir seit 2018 um mehr als 3 Mrd. € gesenkt."
German translation: "Gleichzeitig sind wir viel effizienter geworden; wir haben die laufenden Kosten seit 2018 um mehr als 3 Milliarden Euro gesenkt."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Nonetheless, our cost-cutting did not come at the expense of investments into our future business."
German human reference: "Die Sparsamkeit ging aber nicht zu Lasten unserer Zukunftsinvestitionen:"
German translation: "Unsere Kostensenkungen gingen jedoch nicht zu Lasten von Investitionen in unser zukünftiges Geschäft."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "During our transformation, we spent a total of € 15 billion on technology in order to accelerate progress in this essential field."
German human reference: "Insgesamt 15 Mrd. € haben wir während unserer Transformation für Technologie aufgewendet, um auf diesem essenziellen Feld schneller voranzukommen."
German translation: "Während unserer Transformation haben wir insgesamt 15 Milliarden Euro in Technologie investiert, um Fortschritte in diesem wesentlichen Bereich zu beschleunigen."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "We have invested a further € 4 billion in our control functions, strengthening them and clearing out previous weaknesses."
German human reference: "Weitere 4 Mrd. € haben wir in unsere Kontrollfunktionen gesteckt, um diese zu schärfen und frühere Schwachstellen zu bereinigen."
German translation: "Wir haben weitere 4 Milliarden Euro in unsere Kontrollfunktionen investiert, um sie zu stärken und frühere Schwächen zu beseitigen."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "We have made important progress as a result, although we know that there is still work to be done."
German human reference: "Wir haben dadurch wichtige Fortschritte gemacht, auch wenn uns bewusst ist, dass hier noch Arbeit vor uns liegt."
German translation: "Wir haben wichtige Fortschritte erzielt, obwohl wir wissen, dass noch Arbeit zu tun ist."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "We funded all investments in technology and controls from our own resources, as well as the costs of restructuring our bank."
German human reference: "Sämtliche Investitionen in Technologie und Kontrollen haben wir aus eigenen Mitteln finanziert, ebenso wie die Kosten für den Umbau unserer Bank."
German translation: "Wir haben alle Investitionen in Technologie und Kontrollen aus eigenen Mitteln finanziert, ebenso wie die Kosten für die Umstrukturierung unserer Bank."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Nevertheless, we had sufficient capital buffers at all times during the transformation."
German human reference: "Trotzdem haben wir zu jedem Zeitpunkt während der Transformation über ausreichende Kapitalpuffer verfügt."
German translation: "Dennoch hatten wir während der Transformation jederzeit ausreichende Kapitalpuffer."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our Common Equity Tier 1 capital ratio exceeded our target of at least 12.5 percent for the entire three and a half years of our transformation."
German human reference: "Unsere harte Kernkapitalquote lag während der gesamten dreieinhalb Jahre über unserem Zielwert von mindestens 12,5%."
German translation: "Unser Verhältnis des Common Equity Tier 1-Kapitals übertraf während der gesamten dreieinhalb Jahre unserer Transformation unser Ziel von mindestens 12,5 Prozent."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "At the end of 2022, it was 13.4%, which means that we met the target we set ourselves in 2019."
German human reference: "Ende 2022 betrug sie 13,4% – damit haben wir die Vorgabe erfüllt, die wir uns im Jahr 2019 gesetzt hatten."
German translation: "Ende 2022 betrug es 13,4%, was bedeutet, dass wir das Ziel erreicht haben, das wir uns 2019 gesetzt haben."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "The same applies to our other key goals:"
German human reference: "Das Gleiche gilt für die anderen zentralen Ziele unserer Transformation:"
German translation: "Das Gleiche gilt für unsere anderen wichtigen Ziele:"
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "At 9.4%, our post-tax return on tangible equity at the end of 2022 significantly exceeded our target of 8.0%, which includes a positive valuation effect on deferred tax assets."
German human reference: "Die Nachsteuerrendite auf das materielle Eigenkapital überstieg Ende 2022 mit 9,4% unseren Zielwert von 8,0% deutlich, wobei hierin ein positiver Bewertungseffekt bei latenten Steueransprüchen enthalten ist."
German translation: "– Mit 9,4% übertraf unsere Nachsteuerrendite auf materielles Eigenkapital Ende 2022 deutlich unser Ziel von 8,0%, was einen positiven Bewertungseffekt auf aktive latente Steuern beinhaltet."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "At 75%, our cost/income ratio was 18 percentage points lower than in 2018 and within the range we announced during the year 2022."
German human reference: "Die Aufwand-Ertrag-Relation lag mit 75% 18 Prozentpunkte niedriger als 2018 und innerhalb der Bandbreite, die wir im Laufe des Jahres 2022 angekündigt hatten."
German translation: "– Mit 75% lag unsere Kosten-/Erlös-Relation 18 Prozentpunkte unter dem Wert von 2018 und innerhalb des Bereichs, den wir im Laufe des Jahres 2022 angekündigt hatten."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our leverage ratio was 4.6% compared to a target of 4.5%."
German human reference: "Die Verschuldungsquote betrug 4,6%, verglichen mit einem Zielwert von 4,5%."
German translation: "– Unsere Verschuldungsquote lag bei 4,6% im Vergleich zu einem Ziel von 4,5%."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Our business is built on four strong pillars"
German human reference: "Unser Geschäft steht auf vier starken Säulen"
German translation: "Unser Geschäft ruht auf vier starken Säulen"
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Besides meeting our financial targets, another ambition was at the heart of our strategic realignment; to make our bank more differentiated and balanced so that each of our four business areas can make a significant contribution to the group's business success."
German human reference: "Neben den Finanzzielen stand für uns ein weiteres Bestreben im Mittelpunkt unserer strategischen Neuausrichtung: Wir wollten unsere Bank differenzierter und ausgewogener aufstellen, sodass jeder unserer vier Geschäftsbereiche einen signifikanten Anteil zum Geschäftserfolg beitragen kann."
German translation: "Neben dem Erreichen unserer finanziellen Ziele war ein weiteres Ziel unserer strategischen Neuausrichtung, unsere Bank differenzierter und ausgeglichener zu machen, sodass jeder unserer vier Geschäftsbereiche einen bedeutenden Beitrag zum Geschäftserfolg der Gruppe leisten kann."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Here, too, we made very good progress."
German human reference: "Und auch hier sind wir sehr gut vorangekommen:"
German translation: "Auch hier haben wir sehr gute Fortschritte gemacht."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "Almost two-thirds of our revenues last year came from the areas that we describe as stable owing to the fact that they are less subject to cyclical fluctuations, the Corporate Bank, the Private Bank and Asset Management."
German human reference: "Fast zwei Drittel der Erträge stammten im vergangenen Jahr aus den Bereichen, die wir als stabil bezeichnen, weil sie weniger zyklischen Schwankungen unterliegen – also der Unternehmensbank, der Privatkundenbank und der Vermögensverwaltung."
German translation: "Fast zwei Drittel unserer Einnahmen im letzten Jahr kamen aus den Bereichen, die wir aufgrund der Tatsache, dass sie weniger den zyklischen Schwankungen unterliegen, als stabil beschreiben, das Firmenkundengeschäft, das Privatkundengeschäft und das Asset Management."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "The biggest growth spurt in 2022 was recorded by the Corporate Bank, which increased its revenues by 23 percent to € 6.3 billion, the highest value since the division was founded."
German human reference: "Den größten Wachstumsschub verzeichnete 2022 dabei die Unternehmensbank, die ihre Erträge um 23% auf 6,3 Mrd. € steigerte, den höchsten Wert seit Gründung der Sparte."
German translation: "Den größten Wachstumsschub im Jahr 2022 verzeichnete das Firmenkundengeschäft, das seine Einnahmen um 23 Prozent auf 6,3 Milliarden Euro steigerte, den höchsten Wert seit Gründung der Sparte."
Score (0−100):

Score the following translation from English to German with respect to the human reference on a continuous scale from 0 to 100 that starts with "No meaning preserved", goes through "Some meaning preserved", then "Most meaning preserved and few grammar mistakes", up to "Perfect meaning and grammar".

English source: "The Corporate Bank benefited from the overall higher interest rate levels, but at the same time it also increased the volume of business."
German human reference: "Dabei profitierte der Bereich von dem insgesamt höheren Zinsniveau, gleichzeitig erhöhte er aber auch das Geschäftsvolumen."
